metadata.title: CVE-2024-48937 on Ubuntu 24.04 LTS (noble) - medium
metadata.description: Znuny before LTS 6.5.1 through 6.5.10 and 7.0.1 through 7.0.16 allows XSS.JavaScript code in the short description of the SLA field in ActivityDialogues is executed.

criterions.comment: znuny package in noble is affected and may need fixing.
